text: Lori Petty (born October 14, 1963) is an American actress and movie director. Her roles include playing Tyler Endicott in the 1991 movie Point Break, Kit Keller in A League of Their Own (1992), Rae Lindley in Free Willy (1993), and the title role in Tank Girl in 1995. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American movie directors Category:Actors from Chattanooga, Tennessee Category:Actors from Iowa City, Iowa
title: Lori Petty
